title: Analyst Developer for Gucci
description:
[www.gucci.com](http://www.gucci.com) • [www-m.gucci.com](http://www-m.gucci.com)\
Development and maintenance of the e-commerce site and of a customized CMS application, using Ruby on Rails.\
This experience gave me the chance to work with Akamai, Rackspace, Solr and Memcached, technologies which I had never used before.

* Direct communication with both the Italian and American client.
* Development of the mobile application ​[www-m.gucci.com](http://www-m.gucci.com).
* Code written as far as possible in TDD (test driven development).
